definition: to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters

sentences.english: Induced abortion with Rivanol is still mainly choice for intermediate pregnancy (>16 weeks).
sentences.chinese: 孕期超過16周以利凡諾引產宜作宮頸準備。

sentences.english: More than 100 days if pregnant, you will can only do induced labor surgery.
sentences.chinese: 如果懷孕超過100天的話，就只能做引產手術了。

sentences.english: A big problem around the country is the rate of births that are induced.
sentences.chinese: 全國各地的一個大問題是引產率。

sentences.english: Objective To study application of rivanol in induced abortion of pregnancy with complications in the second and third trimester.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究利凡諾用於中晚期高危妊娠引產的應用。

sentences.english: Methods Chondrocytes which were obtained from aborted fetal were cultured in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 方法水囊引產胎兒的軟骨細胞體外單層培養。

sentences.english: Objective:To compare the effect of labor induced with intravenous infusion of high and low dose of oxytocin in late gestation.
sentences.chinese: 比較大小劑量縮宮素靜脈輸注對晚期妊娠引產的效果。

sentences.english: Induction at 41 weeks with cervical ripening lowers the cesarean delivery rate.
sentences.chinese: 妊娠41周，經促宮頸成熟後引產可降低剖宮產分描。

sentences.english: If labor has not begun within a reasonable time after rupture of membranes induction with oxytocin ( Pitocin ) is appropriate.
sentences.chinese: 若破膜後產程未在適當時間開始，可給予縮宮素引產。

sentences.english: She had to induced because the baby was four weeks late.
sentences.chinese: 她的孩子晚了四個星期仍未出生，因此要給她引產。

sentences.english: A cervical examination should be performed before initiating attempts at labor induction.
sentences.chinese: 開始進行引產前，應行宮頸檢查。

sentences.english: Group 3∶23 cases, Mifepristone was used for initiating midtrimester abortion with Ethacridine intra-amniotic instillation.
sentences.chinese: 第三組23例，米非司酮聯合依沙吖啶引產。

sentences.english: Clinical Observation of Rivanol Combined with Mifepristone in the Induction of Labor in Mid-pregnancy;
sentences.chinese: 目的探討依沙吖啶聯合米非司酮用於中孕引產的效果。

sentences.english: Doctors often induce labor in pregnant women with powerful drugs.
sentences.chinese: 醫生常常使用強效藥來爲孕婦引產。

sentences.english: After induced abortion, she was transferred to surgical department for surgery.
sentences.chinese: 結腸鏡診斷結腸癌，引產後轉普外科行手術治療。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effects of exogenous estrogen on fracture healing.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討外源性雌激素對利凡諾引產的影響。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of combination of misoprostol and oxytocin used in late gestation induced labor.
sentences.chinese: 目的米索前列醇合併催產素用於晚期妊娠引產的效果。

definition: abbr. for 產前檢查|产前检查[chan3 qian2 jian3 cha2]
to help a mother give birth
the breeding season (zool.)/oestrus (period of sexual receptivity of female mammals)
(metaphorical) punching bag/undeserving target of sb's wrath
having given away a bride, to lose one's army on top of it (idiom)/to suffer a double loss after trying to trick the enemy
pinyin: pei2 le5 fu1 ren2 you4 zhe2 bing1

definition: to reveal the cloven foot (idiom); to unmask one's true nature/to give the game away
dumbstruck and unable to reply (idiom); left speechless/at a loss for words
